name: Digital Identity Verification
desc: Digital Identity Verification uses biometrics and AI to authenticate individuals online, ensuring trustworthy interactions in finance and online services while protecting against identity theft and fraud.

name: The Covid-19 Vaccination Tracking
desc: Tracking monitors and records the distribution and administration of COVID-19 vaccines. Using data analytics and technology, it offers real-time insights into vaccination progress.

name: Forecasting Renewable Energy Systems
desc: Advancing sustainability, Renewable Energy Systems Forecasting uses cutting-edge technology and data-driven models to optimize renewable energy source performance, enhancing energy efficiency
